General.Name: American Copper Development Corporation
General.Description: American Copper Development Corporation engages in the exploration and development of mineral properties in Canada. It primarily explores for copper and gold deposits. The company holds interests in the Lordsburg Project that includes 970 contiguous Federal patented and unpatented lode mining claims covering 7,560 hectares located in southwest New Mexico. It also has an option to acquire a 49% interest in the Chuchi South project that includes 13 mineral claims covering 3118.7 hectares; and 100% undivided interest in the Chuchi West project that includes 4 mineral claims covering 4,961.0 hectares located in Omineca mining division, British Columbia. American Copper Development Corporation was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
